website_summaries.verdict: Samsung's Q8 has the image quality, design and cool extras to make a compelling alternative for high-end shoppers who don't want an OLED.
pros: The Samsung Q8 series serves up excellent image quality, with deep black levels, prodigious brightness, accurate color, superb video processing and powerful high dynamic range performance
It has sleek, modern styling and best-in class features
Its unique Ambient mode helps blend into your decor when the TV is "off
cons: More expensive than many TVs with similar image quality, and not THAT much cheaper than an LG OLED
Bixby can't compete with Alexa or Google Assistant

customer_reviews.title: Great Colors, Bad Motion Artifacts
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 2018 QLED in hopes that Samsung had fixed the issues with the 2017 QLED, but unfortunately not. The colors are great but the QLED still does not have camera pan motion right. I don't know how professional reviews of these displays never mention all the artifacts and vertical banding that shows up when the camera moves. For instance on a long pass in football when the camera moves to stay with the ball, vertical ghost lines appear across the screen until the camera is still again. I've adjusted all relevant settings but nothing fixes the issue. If only the KS9000 was still available. Perhaps it's cousin the NU8000 would be a better choice.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Archbold

customer_reviews.title: It shipped from World Wide Stereo which was also a very good experience. They shipped the tv very fast and ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve spent a few weeks with the TV now and I’m very impressed. It shipped from World Wide Stereo which was also a very good experience. They shipped the tv very fast and also through a special shipping company that was extra careful with it. The tv shipped on its own pallet. Back to the tv. It produces very bright and vivid colors. Also very deep blacks!! Game mode works very well with the Xbox One X/PS4 Pro/Nintendo Switch. Also if you happen to pop in a blu ray or turn on Netflix the tv will turn off game mode. If your a gamer and are afraid of the oled burn in issue I would highly recommend this tv!!
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Page

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have had this TV (“75) for a little over a month. So far, it has been absolutely wonderful. Easy to set up, gorgeous picture. Great for 4K movies and gaming. The remote is bare bones but works with voice commands, so it’s no problem at all. The audio is fine for what it is; I bought a sound bar and use that instead, but the built-in speakers would be fine for the average consumer. I am very happy with my purchase and would absolutely recommend this TV to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: J. Schmaltz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Picture,  nice design.
customer_reviews.text: Pluses: Sleek design, great awesome incredible picture. Dark darks and vivid colors. Wall mounted by myself in 30 minutes. Negatives: Samsung needs to FIRE whoever designed this POS remote control Absolutely dreadful. Also bought 55" same crummy remote again good grief. It didnt work half the time, bad batteries came with it, and lost connection to TV. Threw it right in the garbage. Also need to have LONGER power cord.
customer_reviews.author: C. Parillo

customer_reviews.title: Great picture
customer_reviews.text: Previously had a HD plasma TV with a great picture but recently needed to get a TV with WiFi, so bought the Samsung QLED TV, Was concerned that the picture you see in the store is a very high resolution feed so the picture is better than when you get it home, that was not the case. We have Uverse and the picture is spectacular. Would recommend this TV to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: cdub

customer_reviews.title: Ambient Mode Does Not Work
customer_reviews.text: Ambient Mode does not work. The TV will shut off after about a minute despite the automatic off timer being set at 1 hour or more. Very displeasing.
customer_reviews.author: Min

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Display
customer_reviews.text: I went from an old Panasonic plasma that I loved but it just didn't have the features I needed to this. Had the plasma for 12 years. Maybe there are better displays out there but as far as I'm concerned this one is perfect. Great picture, network connectivity, IOs, design etc. all perfect. One small design issue, once the display is mounted it is very difficult to get to the IOs for any changes. Course you shouldn't need to do this but once unless you're adding a device. Also the remote is anything but intuitive. Once you figure it out its fine. It's unique. Bottom line, Luv it and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Best TV ever
customer_reviews.text: If you don't have this TV in your she shed,man cave ,wolf den or whatever you call your TV room. You are missing out on the best TV I have ever seen. I had been looking at the 2017 ,since 2017. I was the price it came down 600 dollars in 2 years. But they since up graded that model year to the 2018 which I purchased for 1000 dollars more than the 2017 model. All I can say is that I have No Regrets. Would definitely buy again if the need ever come up.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Product came broken and seem to have been tampered with
customer_reviews.text: Product came broken and seem to have been tampered with
customer_reviews.author: mohamad r abdel

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to expectations
customer_reviews.text: This TV was very easy to unbox and setup. The menus are much more intuitive than the LG televisions I have used. The picture is great. I’ve had this for over a month and I haven’t quite got the picture calibration quite right but I’m getting there. The internal speakers are ok, I will definitely be getting a sound bar sometime.
customer_reviews.author: FlyF9

customer_reviews.title: You simply will not be disappointed! With this class 8 TV.
customer_reviews.text: The picture is fantastic. Just get one of those high definition 4K whatever things that Disney puts out like the butterflies or birds and you will be amazed. I admit to not be much of a techie but controlling the darn thing is getting better all the time. I'm looking forward to exploring some of its Advanced capabilities. It's such a powerful TV! It's added Beauty to my life and provides a sense of wonder.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Excellent TV!!
customer_reviews.text: This TV went in my den for some gaming and late night tv watching when the family is asleep, my other tv is an LG OLED and it does have an amazing picture but you have to be more careful as burn in is a risk. So I didnt want to have to worry about that with this but I still wanted excellent blacks and amazing colors and so far this TV doesn't disappoint. I highly recommend it while you can still find the Q8FN as the 2019 models aren't reviewing as good
customer_reviews.author: Inez

customer_reviews.title: SUPER AWESOME 4K UHD TV!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The screen quality is AMAZING. I have it hooked up to an XBox One X, resolution at 4K UHD. Games look awesome, and movies look amazing. For some reason, the HDR (High Dynamic Range) was turned off by default on the TV, which made the 4K movies look dark. But once the HDR is enabled in the TV Settings, the 4K movies look absolutely amazing!!! I like that this QLED screen does not have burn-in problems. Dark scenes are plenty good enough. There is not one dead or stuck pixel on the whole screen. Setup was easy. Hooks up to your wi-fi. Haven't really used the Apps that come with the TV yet.
customer_reviews.author: calc

customer_reviews.title: Fits my needs perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace my old 40’ vizo and didn't go with Sony because I could find the same one I got my parents and i have to say so far after vast research my conclusion felt this TV best fit my needs and I'm extremely happy, it struggles a bit when connected to my pc and playing wow but I didn't get it for that reason since I primarily us it for TV movies and video games on xbox and playstation. Side note I never updated the tv because I heard the update affects it a bit also.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful TV
customer_reviews.text: This is a great TV. However, I only gave remote control 4 stars because the babbling voice is annoying in the extreme. I don't even think it is in English. I don't use the smart features all that much anyway, so I'm content to use the cable remote Until I'm more familiar with it. The voice still annoying when first turned on... but to be fair, I have not contacted Samsung for help in how to stop the babbling voice. The picture is AMAZING. I've only had it for a couple of weeks. Will follow with another review later.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: One of the best TV’s you can get if you can still get it.
customer_reviews.text: To be fair upgraded from a 1st gen HDTV that was purchased in 2006. So anything I would have gotten, would be light years ahead if what I just replaced. That being said, I did a lot of research & this tv in particular, the 2018 model, has more performance than the 2019 and at least so far, the first Samsung tv of 2020. I’m glad I was able to get the 2018 model while they still had some new units left. As for the remote, I’m old school, I need more buttons. This just looks super weird to me. It is Howe we very comfortable in the hand.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Beecher

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful screen, looks great with movies, remote is awesome because its universal, even working to control my sound system. Football so far is the main drawback because of blurring of players when seeing play from the entire field. Requires a lot of adjusting of the expert settings. The bright settings are basically not needed cuz it's just way too bright and way to colorful to enjoy the picture
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: Very good but not great
customer_reviews.text: Not quite OLED but very good picture if input is high def. Too bright with HDR+ and a bit dark in other modes. I am sure a UTUBER out there has the answer. Somewhat cheap build quality. Overall very good but when OLED price becomes reasonable I will pop on one.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Samsung TV
customer_reviews.text: Box came damaged. So far so good. Did not have any Issues setting up. Be careful what info you authorize the TV having access to if you so choose. We did purchase 4 year extended warranty so I feel okay about the purchase. A bit pricey but my husband would not settle for a cheaper one. Excellent picture quality. Remote is not my favorite, we'll see! Remote will not properly work with Cable Box, DVD Player or Surround Sound :-(
customer_reviews.author: Brian Meadows

customer_reviews.title: Came with dead pixels...
customer_reviews.text: Overall the TV is fantastic. I can't complain about the quality of the picture on this thing but I got a bad one none the less. I don't know if it's the TV model itself that has issues or if the seller tried to pull a quick one on me but either way. For the money I paid I'm not accepting the bottom half of the TV screen with multiple dead pixels. Going to return, get a refund, and try again.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Best color
customer_reviews.text: Really outstanding color, very vibrant picture, couldn't be more pleased with the picture quality regardless of the input source, cable, blu-ray or streamed content. (Not sure about how it does with gaming consoles.)
customer_reviews.author: sisyphus

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic TV. Poorly designed remote
customer_reviews.text: The TV is great. With a little tweaking the picture is absolutely stunning. The remote, on the other hand, is absolutely ridiculous. The majority of the buttons will never be used and frankly I don't know why they are on the remote. Important buttons that should be on the remote are missing. Clearly the engineers designing the more are not he same people designing the TV.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas E

customer_reviews.title: TV cracked during mount process
customer_reviews.text: Lifted TV up to mount it and with little pressure it cracked. Super disappointed. Would not recommend. Be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Skip Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Good Bang 4 Your Buck
customer_reviews.text: Received my Samsung Q8F 55" QLED TV from Beach quickly, was fairly easy to set up, picture quality was pretty good [have had the set less than a week] so haven't really experimented adjusting picture quality and colors as we find picture pretty good right out of the box. Amazon and Beach make a good duo for buying high end merchandise!
customer_reviews.author: Donuthin

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I got this TV to watch mostly hockey and movies. It is amazing. Easy to use. Intuitive. Great picture quality. And even though the UPS guy dropped it on our floor from half a foot in the air, the packaging was great, so nothing was wrong or cracked or broken. I am a fan of Samsung TVs.
customer_reviews.author: N. Wilbury

customer_reviews.title: Nice TV
customer_reviews.text: I got this model because of the anti-reflection features not found in the Samsung Q6 series. I also didn't want to deal with the burn in of the OLED type. The smart features are decent so this is the first smart TV I don't just use as a monitor. The picture is very good and I am very happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Eudy

customer_reviews.title: Taking our TV entertainment to a brand new level!!
customer_reviews.text: Merry Christmas to you and yours! I’m watching all of my holiday favorites on my new, super amazing and jaw dropping, delicious in brightness and color, QLED television! Technology sure has come a long way since I bought my prior TV. Anyhoo... This thing is gorgeous. It takes television shows and movie watching to a whole new level... heck... even my childhood favorites like Brady Bunch come alive on this huge screen! Yep. I highly recommend that you make a way to get one of these as soon as you possibly can. 🕺🏻
customer_reviews.author: kenny pecher

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Picture
customer_reviews.text: My old TV was a Samsung (still working beautifully) but I wanted the smart features so I didn't have to use the Roku stick for Netflix. I only looked at Samsung because of the reliability of my last TV. I was not disappointed - the picture is beautiful and I am able to switch from Directv to Netflix easily without using another remote. My son installed the TV so I can't tell you about the installation. I also was very pleased that the TV was delivered 2 days after I ordered it, even though I do not have Amazon Prime. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to wall mount
customer_reviews.text: This model is not compatible with either VESA or Samsung no-gap wall mounts. Even samsungparts.com shows the wrong data [see case # 100608:83047]. The model, which is otherwise an excellent TV, needs to be stacked on a shelf or cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice Dean

customer_reviews.title: Tv fine. Delivery meh.
customer_reviews.text: No issue with the television. Amazon delivery logistics could use improvement. Ordered with 2 day delivery. No acknowledgement of the order or update on the delivery until the night before. This update pushed the delivery date out another day. This may be ok for a back scratcher order but a large television delivery should break free of the amazon cloud and warrant some human interaction to work out logistics to ensure that someone is home to receive. Should have purchased locally.
customer_reviews.author: eieio

customer_reviews.title: Definitely exceeds my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: We are still familiarizing ourselves with it and all it can do, but WOW. I was unable to see one prior to purchase, relying mainly on reviews and the Samsung reputation. The color is amazing and the amount of detail we are now able to see is mind-blowing. The simplicity of the remote is astounding as well. Tremendously happy.
customer_reviews.author: John Morris

customer_reviews.title: Awesome TV but can’t be mounted flush to wall
customer_reviews.text: Awesome TV but can’t be mounted flush to wall- Samsung is funny about the stuff this is an upgraded version over the seven series but in less you’re buying the curved version it does not have the pocket in the back of the TV mount it closer to the wall. Turn this one for a Q7
customer_reviews.author: S. L. Seamans

customer_reviews.title: Love the picture
customer_reviews.text: I really like this tv. A watched a few demo movies in 4K and the picture is pretty stunning. Can't get my kids off of it so I can enjoy it. The seller shipped tv promptly and was packaged in an additional box and included bubble wrap inside. Great buying process from this seller. Would definitely purchase from them again. Product was as advertised. I'm typically skeptical of making such a purchase as this online, but had no issues. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: James B

customer_reviews.title: I love this TV
customer_reviews.text: I love this TV. It works great with my cable box and receiver. The picture is so sharp and full of detail, we can see everyone's lines and wrinkles .
customer_reviews.author: NJ M.

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for great price
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical to buy a TV online- what if it arrived broken or had any other issues requiring return?? That would have been a pain and likely an expensive incident!! But it was such a great price for last years model, which I couldn’t find anywhere else, so I took a chance. Luckily, no issues! Thus, I’m a happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S.

customer_reviews.title: Love this Television
customer_reviews.text: This TV has such exceptional color and delicate picture detail! Setup was a snap and the remote is very awesome, lightweight and user friendly...also helps that it listens when you speak. Great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: MAS

customer_reviews.title: Horrible fedex delivery experience.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tv but make sure to watch for who is going to deliver the tv. At the time Fedex was deliver the tv to me and the fedex guy just drop the tv right at my front door like he had a bad day. Good thing the TV seem fine.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Have to reset the TV daily for it to work.
customer_reviews.text: Picture is nice but the TV gets confused when changing channels and has to be reset to work properly. Talked to customer support and there is no fix for this as of this post other than unplugging and re-plugging the TV in every time this happens which is daily.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Picture speaks for itself, but I'm very pleased with the software and abundance of interfaces.
customer_reviews.text: I had a 10 year old Visio, which still worked fine, but lacked all of the connected services and support for newer protocols. I'm still tweaking things, but the set-up was short and easy - no instructions required.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Amazing TV
customer_reviews.text: This tv turns on in less then a second, amazing picture quality and smart features. I got rid of my roku box (which I loved) when I got this tv as everything is built into it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal TV
customer_reviews.text: The TV is worth every penny but to get the picture just right it does take a few tries with the settings as the factory settings aren't the best imo. I highly recommend this product to anyone looking for a upper tier 4K TV.
customer_reviews.author: Slay

customer_reviews.title: Great Picture
customer_reviews.text: Great TV. Excellent picture and decent sound. I use a soundbar so the sound wasn't that important to me, but it sounds pretty good. The QLED display really does seem to produce a better picture than the more traditional LED.
customer_reviews.author: steve albright

customer_reviews.title: Love this TV!
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with my new TV! Great picture, easy to set-up. The 2018 version is comparable to the 2019 model for a lot less money. There is truly no reflection and works great in a bright room!
customer_reviews.author: Matt MWF

customer_reviews.title: Picture Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: The gentlemen that delivered the TV had it up and running quickly. They showed us what not to touch as far as the screen and I only had to move it inches once they placed it on the stand and ran in the three HDMI cables. The remote pretty much "installed" itself. I got into the "Expert" section and tweaked the settings a little more. WOW great picture and very good sound. Very happy with the Q8.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice QLED set, good deal
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the Samsung 65” Q8F to step up from an aging Panasonic 58” LED model. The Samsung is a nice upgrade, newer features with a noticeably better picture. Bought a “used - like new” offering from Audio & Video Center. Unit was in pristine condition. Note: mounting holes on back of unit are not centered, approximately 5 inches above center.
customer_reviews.author: B. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: No wall mount screws
customer_reviews.text: For $1500 you'd expect them to include 4 screws to be able to wall mount your TV.
customer_reviews.author: Ilir Goga

customer_reviews.title: Bad QC
customer_reviews.text: My second Q8fn. I got a bad panel cause the local dimming is awful. And the screen has back light bleed in the bottom corners. Blooms worse than my Sony 900f. Samsung has horrible build quality.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT TV
customer_reviews.text: Excellent TV I'm so happy I did a lot of research and found the 2018 series was better than the 2019. I love everything about this TV.
customer_reviews.author: Brian F.

customer_reviews.title: Love it - well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded my old Samsung 7 series curved 4k TV to this and have not been disappointed. Excellent picture quality and super easy to set up and use. Works seamlessly with the XBox One X for gaming too. Netflix and Amazon Prime 4k content looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Goodland

customer_reviews.title: Fun TV
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tv. Fairly easy to set up. Outstanding picture, sound quality is great on its own. Lots of features to choose. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: SjF

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Wireless Card
customer_reviews.text: Plan on hooking this device up to ethernet. Loses wireless connection multiple times a week. Something none of our other 10-12 devices do.
customer_reviews.author: Edward J Boone

customer_reviews.title: Superior TV!
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality of this TV is fantastic! The extra money spent on this model to get the full array backlight is well worth it for deep blacks. We have this in a large living room with many windows and it is amazing how bright and crisp this TV is.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Forced bloatware and advertisements
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality is incredible, but Samsung has taken every greedy opportunity to pre-install bloatware and shove them in front of your face. They've disabled the ability to remove the apps they're being paid to force on you. They've also started showing sponsored recommendations in the menu. It's tough to appreciate the tv and picture quality when the software is infested, but it's a great looking set!
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect TV for bright rooms!!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible picture! We had a serious glare issue and after lots of research found this TV. Beautiful bright picture that beats the glare. Color is so vivid and precise. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful picture degrades rapidly at about 45 degree angle
customer_reviews.text: Great picture after calibration. Off angle viewing is poor. Remote is universal and takes over most functions of equipment even those that need RF, but can not power off soundbar for some reason. Nice looking frame. Feels pretty solid.
customer_reviews.author: Damon Niewold

customer_reviews.title: Caution!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great picture. However after a few short months of use, it has began turning off and on by itself. I am awaiting support from Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Low3516

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: I love this TV! The picture and colors are excellent. I use it a lot for gaming and it’s a vast improvement over my previous 8500 series. Sure, there are better TVs out there, if you want to pay <$4k, but for the price of this set, you won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Paul K

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous display!
customer_reviews.text: This TV has a beautiful display and even better after calibrating. Deep blacks, and very bright whites. It's very close to Oled technology. Smart features are good but I'm not too fond of the remote control or the navigation interface. It's jerky and has slow response time. It's just not fluid enough for me at this price point. Came very securely packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Samsung puts out a winner !
customer_reviews.text: Samsung did a really beautiful job with this television I had the 2017 QLED and this is a definite upgrade as far as black levels and picture quality is just superb .I’m very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Scott R. Allshouse

customer_reviews.title: So far the picture has been subpar...
customer_reviews.text: I am not impressed with the picture, everything looks grainy. Thought it was maybe just my cable tv but it looks the same playing a blue ray on my Xbox one.
customer_reviews.author: Sarina Teyler

customer_reviews.title: Cracked T.V. Screen
customer_reviews.text: My T.V. arrived with a cracked screen. I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie R. Barela

customer_reviews.title: This TV rocks.
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is fantastic. TV was delivered as promised and box was not damaged. Easy set up. By far the best picture quality from all the research I did. Glad I spent the extra for the best.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: brilliant colors
customer_reviews.text: I like this tv very much. The colors are outstanding and the sound is very good. Connecting to streaming services very easy. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: Nestor Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Set! You wont be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set for the money. This is better than the "new" model that's out (Q80). If you're back and forth this is the TV for you! Keeps up with fast motion (no blur) game mode and 4k content is AMAZING!
customer_reviews.author: J Walk

customer_reviews.title: Great for gaming.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome looking TV. I went with qled instead of oled since I'm a gamer and was scared of burn in. After calibrating it, The Division 2 looks stunning on it. Low input lag as well.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Remarkable picture quality even with air antenna.
customer_reviews.text: Air antenna signal is weak where I live, but The QN55Q8FN gets video much better than my old Samsung LCD. Great to watch 4k movies on Netflix and Amazon Prime Video.
customer_reviews.author: Frank G. Jacques

customer_reviews.title: Picture Quality.
customer_reviews.text: We are pleased with our new TV, colors are very vivid.
customer_reviews.author: Duane Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Almost great.
customer_reviews.text: Love this on the sony 800. Great 4K picture, tops. However blu rays and satellite should be left to LG Oled.
customer_reviews.author: Stanly

customer_reviews.title: This Tv is s8mply the best!
customer_reviews.text: I was stuck between Oled and Qled but i am so happy with the Qled it has won my heart over i am in Love.
customer_reviews.author: GINNYVINNY

customer_reviews.title: Big and Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Big and beautiful in my living room. Glad I decided to move up to the class 8. Only real complaint is the set-up program; seemed to cut off in the middle of programming. Feel I lost something.
customer_reviews.author: DBurch311

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic TV!
customer_reviews.text: Picture Quality is out of this world! Trying to use from remote only, smartphone controller is confusing..
customer_reviews.author: RED RED

customer_reviews.title: This TV is amazing! There are no words to describe how wonderful the technology and picture quality
customer_reviews.text: There are no easy words to describe the great interface, amazing technology the beautiful picture.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Osherow

customer_reviews.title: Get a security system!  This TV is not easy to hide from window watchers!
customer_reviews.text: This TV blows me away with the vibrant colors and performance! Just georgous!
customer_reviews.author: DEFCON1

customer_reviews.title: Best TV I Ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Bash TV I had it Extras , hdr+ No Dolby Atmos image for
customer_reviews.author: Alberto

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a xmas gift for my daughter and husband They love it. Excellent product
customer_reviews.author: Charles S Jestings III

customer_reviews.title: Great for movies and Freesync gaming
customer_reviews.text: Great TV, beautiful picture. Freesync for Xbox One X is fantastic. Unless your room is extremely bright there is no need to spend the extra money on the Q9FN
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Love this TV
customer_reviews.text: The features and picture quality is amazing. I’m very happy
customer_reviews.author: Christine VT

customer_reviews.title: I highly  recommend
customer_reviews.text: All like best T.v ever dont have any dislikes Love this t.v and great for my ps4 pro and xbox one x
customer_reviews.author: Sammie32

customer_reviews.title: Great tv
customer_reviews.text: Great picture, love the smart apps. The remote is ok but there is no manual to tell you how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Geier

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: One of the best TVs on the market, if you're looking for a 4k tv that has vibrant colors and really good contrast, this is the TV to get, however, if you want better details in darker scenes, get an OLED TV.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great picture but don't update firmware.
customer_reviews.text: This TV has a great picture. It does take some patience getting it set to your room but once adjusted I couldn't be happier. I reccomend not doing firmware updates on this tv unless you research the update. Samsung is known to nerf their TV's with their firmware updates.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Knesel Jr

customer_reviews.title: Very smart tv
customer_reviews.text: The picture is great, the smart set up is wonderful, but the remote control needs a tutor to come to the house to instruct you for several hours.
customer_reviews.author: James K.

product_meta.title: Samsung 8 Series - Flat 65" QLED 4K UHD Smart TV, 2018
product_meta.description: Performance is the calling of the 2018 Q8 with Full Array Backlight control and impressive HDR for a cutting- edge picture. An anti-glare screen and quantum color make this TV ideal—even in bright rooms.
feature_bullets: Your purchase includes One Samsung 8 Series - Flat 65" QLED 4K UHD Smart TV, 2018 model, One remote control with battery, One power cable and one user manual.

TV dimensions (w/o stand): 57.1" W x 32.6" H x 2.3" D. TV dimensions (with stand): 57.1" W x 35.8" H x 11.6" D. Screen diameter: 64.5”. Screen resolution: 3,840 x 2,160. Stand footprint: 2.2” W x 7.9” H x 11.6” D
TV weight without stand: 58.4 lbs. TV Weight with stand: 59.7 lbs.
Input and outputs: Four HDMI ports, Two USB ports, One Ethernet (LAN) port, One Digital Audio Out (Optical), One RS232C

Smartly controlled Full Array LEDs and an anti-reflective screen reveal detail and depth from ultra-black to pure white. Step up to Elite class HDR with the power to reveal stunning details and in-depth vibrant colors.

With our new Ambient Mode, you can elevate your living room with decorative content, useful information, your own photos, and even some background music. You will not notice the TV on the wall as it blends perfectly with your décor.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars77 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
